topic.title: Email
topic.body: Anyone care to email? I'm looking to learn more about programming and I was hoping someone could send some tips. If you have time, do take a moment, please. Email = t3mm13n37@zeroid.bit

1_134tqSwDpKTdoPABqGskg1YMNptAxfu3Lh.body: How do you find your key? I'm new to qTox.

1_1L5qJn5EFwBHGEhrJHS6it7J3Su2P4Spt4.body: I'm  a beginner. I know a little python and I can do If/Else statements in C.
